mapper.insert: insert into freeboard (idx, name, subject, content, notice, picture, id, realFilePath, sharediet_gup) values (freeboard_idx_seq.nextval, #{name}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{notice}, #{picture}, #{id}, #{realFilePath}, #{sharediet_gup})
mapper.update: update freeboard set hit = hit + 1 where idx = #{idx}
update freeboard set subject = #{subject}, content = #{content}, notice = #{notice}, picture = #{picture}, realFilePath = #{realFilePath} where idx = #{idx}
mapper.select: select * from freeboard where notice = 'on' order by idx desc
mapper.update: update freeboard set sharediet_gup = #{idx} where sharediet_gup = 0
update sharediet set gup = #{idx} where gup = 0
update freeboard set shareTag = 'YES' where sharediet_gup = 0
